entry.title: How to Create Fan Page on Facebook
entry.content:
Today a very  large number of people use Internet and most of them use social networking sites like Facebook, Orkut, Twitter, Omagle etc and we know maximum people are those who are using Facebook to connect with the near and dears live in any corner of the world, some people who use Facebook, make Facebook fan pages, some make it for their interest and some make pages on Facebook for promoting their business.  Now if doing blogging or any business then you must have a fan page on Facebook, in order to create your own page on FB just give 2-3 minutes to this posts, it provide you the simplest way to create a Facebook fan page..

Simplest Procedure of Creating page on Facebook

1. Log in to your Facebook Account.

2. Write pages into Facebook search bar.

3. Click on Facebook pages

4. Click on top right Option Create Page.

5. Choose your needed category.

6. Fill required info about your page. Click on Get Started….

You Done ! Now what are you waiting for, your page is created, start working on it and start promoting your Business, Blog, Website or any product, I think we are blessed this service is free, and it’s effective.

entry.title: How to Add Facebook Like box to My Website
entry.content:
When a bloggers start blogging, the first thing he need to do is the promotion of his blog  through which he can get initial traffic to his blogs and Facebook Like Box is the Primary tool to start Advertisement of any blog.

Many time WordPress Themes have predefined option to add Facebook like box in WordPress through Widgets, but sometimes it’s not given in themes then the blogger manually has to add the FB Like Box to the blog as this is really important.

How to add Facebook like box to Website

Adding Facebook like box to WordPress website or blog is really very easy you just need a Facebook Fan page, if you have already a page then you won’t need to create, else you have to create a Facebook fan page first, then adding that page to blog requires few simple steps to do and it won’t take more than 5 minutes, just follow the steps given below..

 

  1. Log in to your Facebook Account.
  2. Open your site’s Fan page and copy it’s URL (Complete Address)
  3. Now click on Edit Page > Update Info in Admin Panel at top.
  4. Click on Resources given at left sidebar.
  5. Click on Use social Plugins.
  6. Go down and click on Like Box.
  7. Paste your Page URL in box front of you and edit the settins for box size, faces etc.
  8. >Now just click on Get Code Button and then IFRAME.
  9. Copy the Text Code shown in the Box.
  10. Go to your WordPress account and open Widgets.
  11. Click on Text box and drag it into the Widgets.
  12. Paste Code in Text Box and click on save.

You Done ! check out your blog. :)

If you don’t want to do that all technical stuff and want to make it simple and short, copy the code given below and paste it inside your WordPress account where you want to place fb like box. Change the colored URL with your own Facebook page and you’re done.

entry.title: How to Secure Facebook Account
entry.content:
Facebook is the best social networking site, king of Social Networking, need of every Internet user and we can say The Heart beat of  Youth, in short Facebook is most popular and all we great people knows that the most popular thing is always favourite of evils, I mean evils always have their eye over it.

Now Imagine if someone steal your Heartbeat ! no no not in real actually I’m talking if someone hack your Facebook Account, this will be a worst news for anyone I think, nobody wants to loose Facebook account because it is the best way to communicate with near and dear, friends, Girlfriends/boyfriends and many others, I’m just trying to tell importance of Facebook in one’s life and I think this is now a very important part of everyone who use Internet regularly.

 

Facebook always tries to secure all your data in the best possible way, but the black hat hackers are always searching for the loop holes to get access to the unrestricted data.

 

Do you know facebook has how many users, Facebook has one billion users, out of which a recent study said that about 10% accounts are fake which simply means, over 900 million users share their life on Facebook, but most of the people deosn’t enabled the security features provided by Facebook which cause really serious problems sometime.

 

I’m sure you are one of those who share personal life on Facebook, tell me have you enabled your Facebook accounts security settings, most probably your answer will be No ! so I’m going to share most important facebook security tips which surely help you to stay safe over Facebook.

 

Tip 1 to secure Facebook Account

You must have heard about https, https is more secured than http. https is a communication protocol for secure communication over a computer network. Hence it is always recommended to have an https protocol while surfing on Internet. Every Facebook account has an option of secure browsing, but when we create account on fb it is disabled by default. So all you need to do is enable it!

 

Let me tell you the way How to Enable this security setting

  1. click on the down arrow next to the home button then click on the account settings.
  2. click on security at left hand side.
  3. Now in the security settings, click on the very first option named Secure Browsing.
  4. Click on check button in front of  browse Facebook on a secure connection (https) when possible and click on save changes.

 

See the picture below to get what I’m talking about easily 

Now onwards when you browse on Facebook you will have a secured communication!

 

 

Tip 2 to secure Facebook Account

You may know that Gmail has a 2 Step Verification security setting. I personally using this and found it as the best way to secure my account. Now Facebook also providing same way to secure your accounts. With the help of this setting, when you login to Facebook from a different place other than your regular IP, you will receive a text notification on your cell phone/email and it will be very easy for you to know the unauthorized access to your Facebook account.

 

To enable this great security Setting on Facebook, Follow these simple steps

  1. Open Account Setting (same page which you opened before).
  2.  Click on Security at left.
  3. Now click on the second option named Login Notification.
  4. Click on Check button and Fill all the required data (Password and your mobile No.)

 

See the picture below to get what I’m talking about easily

Note : Faceook will take sometime to send you varification code so wait a while, don’t be get frustrated after all it’s the matter of Security.

 

Please let me know if you find these tips helpful, I hope now you feeling more secured to use your Facebook account. If you have any query or suggestion please comment. Have Fun :)

entry.title: How to Access Multiple Facebook Accounts in a Browser
entry.content:
Is Accessing multiple Facebook account through same browser simultaneously possible ? May be you are thinking this, after reading the title of this post. so let me tell Oh Yeah… this is possible and it’s very easy too.

 

Many time when we are using Facebook account we have to open another account so for this we generally use any other browser, but now you won’t need this, here is the solution of this problem, Go through this post and you will get it very easily.

One and only requirement for this scheme is that you should use Google Chrome browser, so install the Google Chrome if you are using any other and follow these steps..

 

1. Open your facebook account by the same way you log into your account normally i.e. by filling your User ID and Password on facebook homepage now you are logged in.

 

2. Now we need to open another account in same browser then Right Click on Facebook icon at top left corner and just click on Open link in Incognito window. like shown in picture below

 

 

3. After clicking on Open link in Incognito window a new Facebook login page will be open in same browser fill your another User ID and Password and enjoy the experiment ;)

 

What is Incognito Window 

In Incognito window any data, website  or Pages you view won’t appear in your browser history or search history, and they won’t leave other traces, like cookies, on your computer after you close all open incognito windows. but any files you download or bookmarks  will be preserved.

 

May be this scheme is also working with other browsers too, but I haven’t tried this so I suggest you everyone to try it with all the browsers you are using, and also share with us if it is possible with any other.
